import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Footer from './footer' import Navbar from './navbar' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import axios from 'axios' import { Baseurl } from '../baseurl' import { useLocation } from 'react-router' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; const CourseDetails = () => { let path = useLocation() const { code } = useParams(); const [course, setCourse] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${Baseurl}coursedetails`, { params: { code: code } }).then((res) => { if (res.data) { setCourse(res.data) } }) }, []) return ( <>

{course.course_title}

{course.description}

Wishlist 1200 Enrolled By Great
Content Description Reviews About Tutor
) } export default CourseDetails
